content.rendered:
There are a lot of Ideas on the Idea Exchange, and the fact that Salesforce takes in ideas from us, the users to consider for new functionality is awesome. Also, let’s admit it, having strangers around the world vote for your Idea feels good, a because you are proud that you are getting votes, your business process isn’t as jacked as you though,  and because you posted a real problem vs requesting existing functionality you never found searching.

Back to the point, lots of ideas on the Idea Exchange, and I can’t post every single one I support here, but here are some near and dear to my heart. Now go read them and either vote our solve the problem. Thank you all for your support, and PLEASE share your favorite Ideas so they get more votes too.

excerpt.rendered: One thing I love about Salesforce is the fact that they listen to their users regarding functionality needs and wants. The Salesforce IdeaExchange is full of great ideas. and when I come across a good one, i campaign for votes. Here are some of the goodies.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Salesforce Ideas:  New Territory Button
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: I know I made my own territory button, but it would be nice if I wouldn't have had to.... That's why there is the amazing IdeaExchange for us to vote for features and functionality we want, like a new territory button. Vote to have a "New Territory" button added to…

img.alt_text: Oh if only the territory model had better usability

jetpack-related-posts.title: Lightning Recycling Bin
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Currently, if you are using the brand new "Lightning Experience" look of Salesforce, not all the functionality of Salesforce Classic is available. This isn't a bad thing, Lighting is new and alive, changing and growing based on the world today and the ideas and needs of the Salesforce Community. It…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Lightning Ideas Delivered
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Know what I like about Salesforce? Well, one thing I really like.... The fact that they listen, seriously.  Are you using the IdeaExchange?  If not, you need to stop reading now, and go check it out before you read on.  Not only do I like the IdeaExchange so I can…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Features You Need To Contact Salesforce For
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Ever wonder what features you need to contact Salesforce to activate or deactivate? Check out the community doc and submit other features you have learned require Salesforce Support.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Yet Another Amazing Idea: Email Alert to Owner’s Manager
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The IdeaExchange is full of amazing ideas. I was creating workflow rules today, and needed to add an Email Alert to inform the owner. As I went about adding the Owner, I thought, "the Owner's Manager should receive the email as well..." and rolled my eyes, dreading the fact that…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Custom Lightning Layouts & Usability Ideas
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Salesforce's Lightning Experience is beautiful. There are a few ideas out there to make it even better. Learn about page layouts and a few of the top ideas to vote for regarding them in this post.
